resources.name: Pokémon Games (Japanese)
resources.description: Popular RPG series with furigana and simple vocabulary.
resources.descriptionLong: Pokémon games are excellent for Japanese learners due to their use of furigana (reading aids above kanji), simple vocabulary, and repetitive text patterns. The games are engaging and provide extensive reading practice in a fun context. Available on Nintendo Switch and 3DS.
resources.notes: Set your Nintendo account region to Japan to download Japanese versions.

resources.name: Persona 5 / Persona 5 Royal
resources.description: Story-rich JRPG with extensive dialogue and voice acting.
resources.descriptionLong: Persona 5 is a critically acclaimed JRPG with an incredible amount of Japanese text and full voice acting. The game covers school life, relationships, and supernatural adventures, exposing players to various speech styles and vocabulary. Excellent for intermediate to advanced learners.
resources.notes: 100+ hours of content. Great for immersion.

resources.name: Final Fantasy XIV
resources.nameJa: ファイナルファンタジーXIV
resources.description: MMORPG with extensive story content in Japanese.
resources.descriptionLong: Final Fantasy XIV is a massively multiplayer online RPG with an award-winning story. Playing in Japanese provides hundreds of hours of reading practice with full voice acting for main story content. The game can be played with Japanese text while keeping the interface in English.
resources.notes: Free trial includes hundreds of hours of content.

resources.name: Dragon Quest XI
resources.description: Classic JRPG series with traditional Japanese storytelling.
resources.descriptionLong: Dragon Quest XI is a traditional JRPG with a charming story and classic gameplay. The Japanese version features extensive text and voice acting. The series is known for its accessible language, making it suitable for intermediate learners.
resources.notes: Definitive Edition includes Japanese voice acting.

resources.name: Steins;Gate
resources.nameJa: シュタインズ・ゲート
resources.description: Acclaimed visual novel with sci-fi time travel story.
resources.descriptionLong: Steins;Gate is a legendary visual novel about time travel and its consequences. The game features extensive Japanese text with full voice acting, covering scientific concepts, otaku culture, and emotional storytelling. Excellent for advanced reading practice.
resources.notes: One of the highest-rated visual novels. Complex vocabulary.

resources.name: CLANNAD
resources.description: Emotional visual novel about family and relationships.
resources.descriptionLong: CLANNAD is a beloved visual novel known for its emotional story about family, friendship, and growing up. The game provides extensive reading practice with everyday Japanese vocabulary and heartfelt dialogue. Multiple routes offer replay value.
resources.notes: Very long game with multiple story routes.

resources.name: Ace Attorney Series
resources.description: Courtroom drama visual novel with engaging mysteries.
resources.descriptionLong: The Ace Attorney series puts you in the role of a defense attorney solving mysteries and defending clients in court. The games feature witty dialogue, memorable characters, and legal vocabulary. Great for intermediate learners who enjoy puzzle-solving.
resources.notes: Multiple games in the series. Start with the Trilogy.

resources.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
resources.nameJa: あつまれ どうぶつの森
resources.description: Relaxing life simulation with simple, everyday Japanese.
resources.descriptionLong: Animal Crossing: New Horizons is a relaxing life simulation game perfect for Japanese learners. The game uses simple, everyday vocabulary and includes furigana. Conversations with villagers provide natural dialogue practice in a stress-free environment.
resources.notes: Change Nintendo Switch language to Japanese to play.

resources.name: Yo-kai Watch Series
resources.description: Kid-friendly RPG with furigana and simple language.
resources.descriptionLong: Yo-kai Watch games are designed for children, making them excellent for Japanese learners. They feature furigana throughout, simple vocabulary, and engaging gameplay. The series offers a fun way to practice reading Japanese.
resources.notes: Great for beginners due to simple language.

resources.name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Series
resources.description: Educational RPG designed specifically for learning Japanese.
resources.descriptionLong: Learn Japanese To Survive! is an RPG series specifically designed to teach Japanese. Games cover hiragana, katakana, and kanji through gameplay mechanics. Battle enemies by correctly identifying characters and words.
resources.notes: Three games: Hiragana Battle, Katakana War, Kanji Combat.

resources.name: Slime Forest Adventure
resources.description: RPG that teaches Japanese characters through gameplay.
resources.descriptionLong: Slime Forest Adventure is an indie RPG designed to teach hiragana, katakana, and kanji. Progress through the game by correctly identifying Japanese characters. The game uses spaced repetition principles for effective learning.
resources.notes: Free indie game. Basic graphics but effective learning.

resources.name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
resources.nameJa: ファイアーエムブレム 風花雪月
resources.description: Tactical RPG with extensive dialogue and character interactions.
resources.descriptionLong: Fire Emblem: Three Houses combines tactical RPG gameplay with extensive character interactions and story content. Playing in Japanese provides practice with various speech styles, from formal to casual, across many characters.

resources.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
resources.nameJa: ゼルダの伝説 ブレス オブ ザ ワイルド
resources.description: Open-world adventure with Japanese text and voice acting.
resources.descriptionLong: Breath of the Wild is an acclaimed open-world adventure game. Playing in Japanese provides exposure to various vocabulary related to nature, combat, and exploration. The game includes Japanese voice acting for cutscenes.
resources.notes: Less text-heavy than traditional RPGs but great for immersion.

resources.name: Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch
resources.nameJa: 二ノ国 白き聖灰の女王
resources.description: Studio Ghibli-style JRPG with beautiful animation.
resources.descriptionLong: Ni no Kuni is a JRPG developed with Studio Ghibli, featuring beautiful animation and an emotional story. The Japanese version includes full voice acting and provides extensive reading practice with fantasy vocabulary.

resources.name: Danganronpa Series
resources.description: Mystery visual novel with unique murder mystery gameplay.
resources.descriptionLong: Danganronpa is a visual novel series where students must solve murder mysteries to survive. The games feature extensive dialogue, unique vocabulary, and engaging stories. Recommended for intermediate to advanced learners who enjoy dark themes.
resources.notes: Dark themes. Three main games in the series.
